content:
There's a popular saying that goes:
The twilight hours are when inspiration tends to strike.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Since I often eat during twilight hours,
do you think I might someday discover the legendary "Dinner-Fu"?
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
"The sunset is beautiful" has a second part to the saying.
But you know what? Manna thinks,
Sometimes it's enough to just remember "the sunset is beautiful."
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content: Long ago, a master watched a mantis molting at dusk, and from this observation, he created the "Mantis Style" martial art.
info: 闲聊-黄昏（17-19）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
